dict.acceptation: 砖，砖块；砖块状物体；一砖的厚度；〈口〉大好人；
用砖建造、砌或铺；用砖围住或堵住；

sent.orig: The commonly brick, semisilica brick, brick, high-alumina brick, chrome brick, magnesia brick, carbon brick, etc.
sent.trans: 常用的耐火砖有硅砖、半硅砖、粘土砖、高铝砖、铬砖、镁砖、碳砖等。

sent.orig: Burn-free brick machine, Environment brick machine, Dank brick machine, cement brick machine, professional brick-making machinery.
sent.trans: 免烧砖机、环保砖机、透水砖机、水泥砖机、专业制砖机械。

sent.orig: The chosen refractory is from ordinary brick, high alumina brick to brick and low creep re.
sent.trans: 选用的耐火材料也从一般的粘土砖、高铝砖到高温特性较好的硅砖及低蠕变耐火材料。

sent.orig: The brick noodles of the space pattern's can change surroundings brick noodles is a contrary appearance.
sent.trans: 方格图案的砖面可转变周围砖面为相反的状态。

sent.orig: His new house was built by himself, brick by brick.
sent.trans: 他的新房子是他自己一块砖一块砖砌起来的。
